        Create a new RenderableObject, set hit model and set his position in the world
        Parameters:
        model - TexturedModel of the entity
        position - position in the world
        rotX - rotation around x-axis in degrees
        rotY - rotation around y-axis in degrees
        rotZ - rotation around z-axis in degrees
        scale - scale of the Model
